definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: The front panel houses a bridge-current meter .
sentences.chinese: 正面板上装有桥式电流表。

sentences.english: Note that the current must flow through the ammeter in order to reach the circuit.
sentences.chinese: 注意，电路中的电流必须通过电流表以测量到读数。

sentences.english: Make sure that the dc ammeter indication increases approximately 5 amperes.
sentences.chinese: 确保直流电流表指示升高大约5安培。

sentences.english: Built-in isolating explosion button and ammeter.
sentences.chinese: 内装隔爆型按钮和增安型电流表。

sentences.english: And even more interesting is the voltage meter and ammeter become free Charge by-product.
sentences.chinese: 而且更妙的是电压表和电流表成了免费的副产品。

sentences.english: Please return these ammeters and voltmeters on board as soon as they are rectified.
sentences.chinese: 电流表与电压表效正后请尽快送回船上。

sentences.english: Ammeter reactions do not come out, it was missing the firmware.
sentences.chinese: 电流表反应不出来，那是固件丢失。

sentences.english: All range voltage, Ampere meter, can suit the demand of customer.
sentences.chinese: 电流表均可按用户要求供货。

sentences.english: An ammeter is a measuring instrument used to measure the electric current in a circuit.
sentences.chinese: 电流表又称安培计，是测量电流的仪表。

sentences.english: To start with, you need to break the circuit so that the ammeter can be connected in series.
sentences.chinese: 开始时，你需要断开电路，以让电流表可以串入。
